title: Love Island's India Reynolds slips into a risqué French maid's costume after Ovie Soko split
text:
She confirmed last week she had split from Ovie Soko, four months on from Love Island.

And India Reynolds, 28, certainly showed the basketballer what he was missing as she slipped into a risqué French maid's costume for a photoshoot with Lovehoney.

The reality star put on a sizzling display as she modelled the racy lace trim corset, which showed off her ample cleavage.

Racy: India Reynolds, 28, certainly showed her ex-boyfriend Ovie Soko what he was missing as she slipped into a risqué French maid's costume for a photoshoot with Lovehoney

The satin number hugged India's curves and showed off her slender waist, with the star also flaunting her derriere in the teeny-tiny G-string.

India completed her sexy Halloween costume with lacy suspenders and a white ruffle hair bow.

For another look, the former glamour model showed off her incredible figure in a sheer red lace négligée.

Sizzling display: For another look, the former glamour model showed off her incredible figure in a sheer red lace négligée

Provocative: The satin corset hugged India's curves and showed off her slender waist, with the star also flaunting her derriere in the teeny-tiny G-string

Sporting a matching lipstick, the brunette beauty posed up a storm before slipping into a grey lacy lingerie set and satin pyjamas.

The provocative photoshoot comes just days after India confirmed she had split from Ovie, 28.

A source told MailOnline the pair have come to an 'amicable' decision to end their brief romance due to conflicting schedules.

Smouldering: India put on a busty display in a grey lace bra, which she complemented with a matching thong and suspenders

Seductive: India let little to the imagination as she covered her modesty with her hands while posing in a white lace bra

The former lovebirds, who reached the final three of Love Island 2019, were thought to be on the rocks over the last few weeks after having rarely been seen together.

The couple finished third on Love Island in July, after striking up a romance just weeks before the series came to an end.

Just days ago, rumours surfaced claiming Ovie had got close to Maya Jama however he hit back at the claims.

He said: 'You know what’s joke? I’ve never met Maya. I’ve never met her in my life. I swear to God, I’ve never met her in my life...

Sexy: The newly-single star modelled a plum silky corset in another look

'They did filming for the very last [Love Island spin-off] Aftersun, which was at the villa, where she was there with two other talents and the whole cast we’d sort of shot... I think it was like a promo.

'You know she was standing outside a door but, no. Never met her in my life.'

Last month Ovie was forced to hit back at claims that India had cheated on him with footballer Kieran Gibbs, 29, at his birthday party in Ibiza.

In an exclusive interview with MailOnline the basketball player said: 'Me and India are happy. I think that's definitely the most important thing. We're very happy.

Summer has come to an end! The provocative photoshoot comes just days after India confirmed she had split from Ovie, 28

'Regardless of how many people [there are] in every one of our lives, there will be opinions. And everyone can have their own opinion.'

Speaking of the cheating claims, India added to MailOnline: 'We've had a week of nightmare things. There was one [rumour] last week and then yesterday there was another. Can we have a break? Can we just live, please?

'We've been absolutely fine, but obviously it's not nice. The worst thing is – something coming out in the paper is one thing, we know it's not true and we can just get over that – but it's all the people on Instagram that start sending you horrible messages.'

'Me and India are happy': Last month Ovie was forced to hit back at claims that India had cheated on him with footballer Kieran Gibbs, 29, (pictured) at his birthday party in Ibiza

Clarifying the situation, she explained: ‘I’ve known Kieran and his brother for years and it was their 30th birthday so I was there with loads of friends and family. There’s nothing about it! It got blown into a ridiculous thing.’

Ovie’s trustworthiness was also under the microscope after it was alleged he had ‘cheated’ by kissing Stormzy’s ex Maya Jama – a report all parties have denied.

Maura Higgins and Curtis Pritchard, as well as Molly-Mae Hague and Tommy Fury, are the only remaining couples from this year's Love Island.
description: India Reynolds, 28, certainly showed her ex-boyfriend Ovie Soko what he was missing as she slipped into a risqué French maid's costume for a photoshoot with Lovehoney.
